trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Olmet is preparing for a patrol of the ruins.
TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_OLMET_000_001<tab>Ah, your timing is quite fortuitous. I have a task that could make use of one with your expertise.
TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_OLMET_000_002<tab>Since beginning our vigil after the fall of Ronka, we Viis have seldom ventured beyond the bounds of Yx'Maja.
TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_OLMET_000_003<tab>But times are changing, and it has come to our attention that the ruins beneath Lake Tusi Mek'ta remain untouched by the Blessed.
TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_OLMET_000_004<tab>Being more familiar with the environs of the west, I think you would be well suited to the endeavor.
TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_OLMET_000_005<tab>According to our records, there are several owl statues somewhere within the ruins. I ask that you find them and ensure they yet remain whole.
TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_OLMET_000_006<tab>You are familiar with Lake Tusi Mek'ta, yes? Then this survey should prove no trouble at all.
TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_SYSTEM03474_000_010<tab>You find nothing out of the ordinary.
TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_SYSTEM03474_000_011<tab>The beak of the owl statue appears to be chipped.
TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_SYSTEM03474_000_012<tab>The statue appears to be covered in algae. You gingerly wipe it away.
TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_OLMET_000_021<tab>You wiped them as well? I'd expect nothing less from an ally of Ronka, and a fellow Viis at that.
TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_OLMET_000_022<tab>You wiped them as well? I'd expect nothing less from an ally of Ronka.
TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_OLMET_000_023<tab>In the days of the Ronkan Empire, the owl was regarded with great reverence. The divine beast of night and keeper of knowledge.

TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_OLMET_000_024<tab>In fact, there is a legend that speaks of a time when darkness fades and the people pray for night. An owl is said to guide <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> who heralds the night's return.
TEXT_LUCKZF015_03474_OLMET_000_025<tab>Perhaps that is why fate brings you here.
